title: Grow your best Crops yet!  PRODUCT REVIEW: Soil test kit

tasks.task: Preparing and testing garden soil for optimal planting conditions.

subtasks: Collect soil samples from various garden areas.
Add distilled water and liquid dish detergent to soil samples.
Shaking and separating soil particles (sand, silt, clay) to determine composition.
Use pH testing tablets to determine current soil acidity.
Analyze nutrient levels (nitrogen, potassium, phosphorus) using color-coded test vials.
Interpret test results to determine necessary soil amendments.
Adjust test results for compost added to the garden.
Wash and prepare tools for next tests.

tasks.task: Amending soil for better plant growth.
subtasks: Adjust soil composition by adding organic matter to improve silt and clay content.
Apply appropriate nutrients based on test results.
Protect soil microorganisms and beneficial insects.
Monitor and adjust soil pH as needed.
Prepare raised beds for planting by adding topsoil and organic compost.
